_source.short_desc: Spinify is a gamification platform that boosts performance and motivates staff! Using friendly competition and social recognition.
_source.long_desc:
Imagine being able to reward your employees making them feel appreciated for completing their work. The best part? You can set everything up in seconds because it's all online, automatic, and fun as heck! So what are you waiting for? 

Get started with our amazing gamification platform today!
_source.target_audience: Spinify is for organizations that want to level up their team's performance and create a motivating culture through gamified competitions, recognition, and coaching.

media.caption: Provide visibility of data for your reps to get a better understanding of how they are performing.
Setup competitions with individual reps, teams, head to head, races, elimination games and more!
Staff are motivated to change work behaviors as they see how their performance compares to the team.
Add fun and excitement to your team by ranking their performance and celebrating their achievements!
Our customers experience a boosts in productivity and performance. Start hitting your targets!

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Provides a channel for team members to share media files, communicate, and work together

category_features.name: Feedback Management
category_features.definition: Collecting and analyzing feedback/reactions from end-users

category_features.name: For Sales Teams/Organizations
category_features.definition: Caters to sales teams

category_features.name: Performance Metrics
category_features.definition: A set of indicators that tracks how well an organization, a division, or a particular project are performing

category_features.name: Benchmarking
category_features.definition: Compare key metrics for the business against prominent players in the industry

category_features.name: Employee Recognition
category_features.definition: Acknowledge and reward employees for reaching specific goals and/or for exemplary performance.

category_features.name: Goal Management
category_features.definition: Allows employees to set and manage work or career related goals.

category_features.name: Negative Feedback Management
category_features.definition: Identify, track, and respond to negative feedback

category_features.name: Performance Management
category_features.definition: Organize and manage the accomplishments and development of employees

category_features.name: Pulse Surveys
category_features.definition: Surveys sent out at regularly scheduled intervals to track important metrics like job satisfaction, work environment, etc.

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Peer-to-Peer Recognition
category_features.definition: Allows employees to praise one another in a social network-like feed visible to the whole organization.

category_features.name: Recognition Tracking
category_features.definition: Track accrued recognition and rewards at an individual employee level

related_products.short_desc: Agile CRM is a complete sales, marketing and service suite designed to let SMBs to sell and market like the Fortune 500.
related_products.features: Agile CRM's Gamification helps increase collaboration, lead conversion and revenue generation by gamifying your sales process.

related_products.short_desc: SAP Litmos Training includes built-in gamification - awarding achievements, points, and badges based on participation in the system.
related_products.features: SAP Litmos Training is a powerful but easy-to-use LMS that includes built-in gamification. Leverage this feature to increase engagement and motivation by awarding achievements, points, and badges based on participation in the system. It's an effective tool for stimulating friendly competition among individuals and teams by encouraging learners to make it to the Leaderboard. Gamification activities can be displayed on learners' personalized dashboards and/or shared in collective views.

related_products.short_desc: EngageBay is a simple, affordable all-in-one marketing, sales and service CRM software to acquire, engage, nurture, close leads.
related_products.features: EngageBay is a simple, affordable, all-in-one marketing, sales and service CRM software built for small businesses and startups to acquire, engage, nurture web visitors and convert them to happy customers. Acquire leads through lead generation forms and popups, engage web visitors through beautiful landing pages, nurture them through engaging emails, and automate your marketing funnel through marketing automation - all from one easy to use platform.

related_products.short_desc: For MSP Industry: Employee recognition, badges, prize store, performance measurement, social networking and gamification functionality.
related_products.features: For MSP Industry - Crewhu is an employee recognition and gamification platform for Managed Service Providers. Crewhu lets you focus on the metrics that matter. Fully integrated with ConnectWise, AutoTask, Kaseya, Teams, Slack...Collect Customer Feedback with CSAT, NPS & Custom Surveys. Recognize and Reward Employees with peer badges, prizes and awards. Create Goal Based Contests that you control and create. Generate results (reduced turnover, enhance company culture, improve bottom line).

related_products.short_desc: Cloud talent management platform for collaboration, 360 feedback, performance management, LMS, idea generation, survey and rewards.
related_products.features: Gamification driven talent management platform proven to improve employee engagement, with performance appraisal, 360 multirater feedback, 1 on1 Feedback, Social Intranet, LMS lite, Goal Management (OKR), with built-in gamification and advanced analytics. Use Gamification to drive behaviors like praising, collaboration, learning and idea generation. The Gamification points can then be used to unlock badges and redeem giftcards

related_products.short_desc: Axonify is the frontline learning solution that's designed to fit with the way frontline emplyees actually work.
related_products.features: Axonify is the frontline learning solution that actually works. Why? Because the experience is fun, fast, personalized and designed to make critical information stick. And employees love it. 83% of users log in 2-3 times a week, which translates into meaningful behavior change that drives the business results you care about.

related_products.short_desc: Compass is a gamification software that helps businesses manage goals, performance, commissions and incentive programs for sales teams.
related_products.features: Compass is the #1 Incentive gamification software for revenue engines. The product can be used for sales teams, channel partners, gig-workforce, or support teams. Compass can be seamlessly integrated with any CRM and comes with pre-built integrations with popular CRMs like HubSpot, Leadsquared, Salesforce and many more that help to set up schemes, provide live scorecards, and performance widgets, one-click payments, game templates, predictions, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Kangaroo Loyalty and Rewards gives your business all the tools to attract, keep, connect and grow your business.
related_products.features:
Maximize your sales by gamifying the customer experience. Kangaroo's robust loyalty marketing program features spin-to-win contests, raffle module, point rewards module, tier rewards, review module, referral engine, and more. Kangaroo's reward program can be completely customized to your brand and is perfect for e-commerce, traditional stores, or both. 

Action on customer insights with our drag-drop email builder, SMS Text with highly targeted segmented audience capability.

related_products.short_desc: With the Qualifio platform, collect data across all your digital channels thanks to 50+ interactive formats.
related_products.features:
Qualifio enables large brands and media to engage audiences across digital channels via 50+ templated interactive formats (quizzes, contests, surveys, tests, animated games, etc.). With stringent adherence to the GDPR, the platform allows the collection of rich first-party data that can be pushed to a client's wider technologies for data enrichment. 

More than 400 enterprises currently use Qualifio including TF1, Nestl, PepsiCo, PSG, MediaMarkt, LOral, RTL, etc.

related_products.short_desc: Echo360 is the leading interactive video learning management, content, engagement, and assessment platform for learners everywhere.
related_products.features: Echo360 is the leading interactive video learning management, content, engagement, and assessment platform serving over 2 million learners across North America, Europe, the Middle East, and Asia Pacific.  Built for the cloud, instructors and learners around the world can use the platform from wherever they are, on any device, to create, record, and consume content, give and receive feedback, and gain real-time insights along their inspired learning journey.

similar_products.short_desc: Dot.vu is an Interactive Content Platform that empowers brands to create Interactive Experiences without writing a single line of code.
similar_products.features:
Dot.vu is an Interactive Content Platform that empowers brands to create Interactive Experiences that engage, entertain, and educate their audiences - without writing a single line of code.  

Powered by a wide range of add-ons and components, the Dot.vu platform gives its users complete creative freedom in crafting unique Interactive Content that differentiates their brand from competitors, provides customer insights, generates leads, and boosts conversion rates.

similar_products.short_desc: Take employee engagement to the next level with TalentCards, the app that makes training feel more like a game, and less like a chore.
similar_products.features:
Meet TalentCards, the mobile learning app that puts training in employees' hands, no matter where they are in the world. Unlike traditional training software, TalentCards is built for deskless and mobile employees- people whose jobs keep them on the move.

Build powerful courses online and deliver them straight to your team's smartphones. TalentCards' gamification mode lets everyone compete for points and rank on the app's leaderboard, making training feel more like a game, and less like a chore

similar_products.short_desc: Rallyware is the complete digital experience for performance enablement, gamifying workforce behaviors that drive corporate returns.
similar_products.features:
Rallyware's complete performance enablement platform drives higher workforce performance and company success, gamifying and rewarding the most profitable behaviors for the workforce.  

Designed as an end-to-end suite for the workforce experience, our L&D, I&R, and opportunity management tools propel core company KPIs like engagement and sales volume.

We unlock workforce and company potential for market leaders such as Avon, Nu Skin, Tupperware, Senegence, Yanbal, Pampered Chef, and others.

similar_products.short_desc: SalesScreen uses gamification to increase performance by aligning desired behaviors with fun incentives, celebrations and rewards.
similar_products.features:
SalesScreen is a sales performance software that uses visualization and gamification to help organizations build happier, more productive workplaces.

Gamification is a powerful tool to motivate entire teams to achieve their targets. 

Inspire your teams towards goal attainment in a fun and engaging way with leaderboards, sales competitions, ranks, badges, and celebrations on TV.

Visualization + Gamification = Engagement & Performance

We boost engagement to boost productivity!

similar_products.short_desc: An award winning game-based assessment tool that measures soft skills in prospective & existing employee's in a fun & engaging process.
similar_products.features:
Owiwi is a fun and engaging psychometric tool that accurately measures prospective and existing employee's soft skills. Think of a combination of advanced scientific methodology packed within an immersive game that candidates enjoy taking part in. 

We take away the stress in the hiring process for the candidate while eliminating the recruiter risk of hiring the wrong candidate by offering data-driven and bias-free insights and accelerating the screening/shortlisting process with automations.

similar_products.short_desc: Call center workforce engagement tool that allows businesses to engage employees and improve performance via gamification methods.
similar_products.features: Alvaria Motivate offers solutions that are designed to increase productivity and reduce employee turnover across all generations - from Boomers and Millennials to the fast-growing Gen-Z workforce. Whether your employees are motivated most by incentives or recognition, competition or collaboration, Alvaria has got you covered. In short, Alvaria Motivate transforms daily routines into rewarding rivalries that give everyone a reason to do their best.

similar_products.short_desc: SAP Litmos Training includes built-in gamification - awarding achievements, points, and badges based on participation in the system.
similar_products.features: SAP Litmos Training is a powerful but easy-to-use LMS that includes built-in gamification. Leverage this feature to increase engagement and motivation by awarding achievements, points, and badges based on participation in the system. It's an effective tool for stimulating friendly competition among individuals and teams by encouraging learners to make it to the Leaderboard. Gamification activities can be displayed on learners' personalized dashboards and/or shared in collective views.

similar_products.short_desc: StriveCloud offers the most flexible solution to bring the power of gamification to your web or mobile app.
similar_products.features: StriveCloud is the go-to gamification solution for web & mobile apps. You can use our modular gamification platform to introduce gamification features to your app. Add points, leaderboards, levels, badges, challenges, lottery systems, quizzes and more to engage your users and incentivize the actions that are most important to you. From activation, retention and monetization, StriveCloud solves the user motivation challenge.

similar_products.short_desc: Offer your customers a personalized and memorable experience without building your loyalty program from scratch.
similar_products.features:
Talon.One is a powerful Promotion Engine for scaling businesses and enterprises that enables you to build targeted and customized marketing promotions built around your customer and session data. Create, manage and track discounts, coupon codes, referrals, loyalty programs and product bundles all in one holistic platform. 

Talon.One's solution is used by worldwide leaders from a wide range of industries such as Ticketmaster, Eddie Bauer, JD Sports, Burger King.

similar_products.short_desc: Make lead collection fun again by gamifying lead capture campaigns with spin-to-win popups, advent calendar forms, and more.
similar_products.features:
The days of showing visitors boring opt-in forms, popups, and widgets are long gone. 

Today's top brands are gamifying the experience by making lead capturing fun for website visitors. 

With Sleeknote, retailers can easily convert visitors into revenue by using fun, dynamic spin-to-win wheel popups, forms, and more. 

Ask new visitors to spin the wheel to win a 10 percent discount. Invite Christmas shoppers to enter giveaways by using "advent calendar" popups. 

The possibilities are endless.

similar_products.short_desc: With the Qualifio platform, collect data across all your digital channels thanks to 50+ interactive formats.
similar_products.features:
Qualifio enables large brands and media to engage audiences across digital channels via 50+ templated interactive formats (quizzes, contests, surveys, tests, animated games, etc.). With stringent adherence to the GDPR, the platform allows the collection of rich first-party data that can be pushed to a client's wider technologies for data enrichment. 

More than 400 enterprises currently use Qualifio including TF1, Nestl, PepsiCo, PSG, MediaMarkt, LOral, RTL, etc.

similar_products.features:
Maximize your sales by gamifying the customer experience. Kangaroo's robust loyalty marketing program features spin-to-win contests, raffle module, point rewards module, tier rewards, review module, referral engine, and more. Kangaroo's reward program can be completely customized to your brand and is perfect for e-commerce, traditional stores, or both. 

Action on customer insights with our drag-drop email builder, SMS Text with highly targeted segmented audience capability.

similar_products.short_desc: Gamification-based SaaS Engagement, Incentive, Recognition & Analytics programs powered by Snowfly. If you track it, we can gamify it!
similar_products.features:
Snowfly provides industry leading Engagement programs that leverage Gamification, Incentives, and Speech Analytics for any industry. Snowfly Offers month-to-month contracts because our programs WORK - and our average customer tenure of over 6 years and industry leading engagement numbers prove it.

Our solutions will help you achieve and improve your custom business objectives including: improved culture, better performance, employee satisfaction, process automation or all of the above!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer phone calls. These solutions enable better monitoring of the customer experience, workflow management and evaluation of employee performance. Whether designed for virtual or site-based locations, Call Center applications manage and catalog the process of customer calls and often allow customers to track the progress of their request via the internet. Call Center software is related to Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Community software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Community tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Community software allows businesses to connect with their customers by creating a space for sharing ideas, collecting opinions, storing Q&A data, and interacting with fellow customers and business representatives.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contest software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contest tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contest software enables marketing professionals to run sweepstakes and other contests on their websites and in social media outlets.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Engagement software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Engagement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Engagement software helps marketers and business managers create and track customer experiences with personalized, engaging content. Customer engagement software often includes digital and mobile engagement tools, live chat, gamification options, personalized web content, and dynamic forms. Related tools can be found in the Customer Relationship Management software, Customer Loyalty software, Customer Satisfaction software, Gamification software, and Blog software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Engagement software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Engagement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Engagement software aims to assist managers with maintaining employee awareness of corporate culture and increasing their level of investment in the company. Employee surveys, gamification tools, team sentiment analytics, and applications that streamline communication are all represented.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Learning Experience Platform software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Learning Experience Platform tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Learning Experience Platforms (LEP) allow organizations to consolidate diverse training resources into a single place and provide personalized learning paths and experiences for each trainee.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Learning Management Systems (LMS) on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Learning Management Systems (LMS) and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Learning Management Systems (LMS) provide a framework through which learning content is delivered and managed. An LMS allows for an anytime, anywhere learning environment, delivering and tracking eLearning courses and testing. A Learning Content Management System (LCMS) enables the organization to learn content from Courseware authoring tools and presentation of the content to students. Learning Management Systems are related to Training software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Microlearning software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Microlearning tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Microlearning software allows organizations to distribute training and learning content in bite-size pieces that can be consumed in short periods of time.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Performance Appraisal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Performance Management software automates the process of reviewing employee performance, setting new objectives, and writing individual development plans. A type of Performance Management solution is 360 degree feedback software, which manages the process in which an employee completes a self-evaluation and is also evaluated by their manager, peers, and direct reports. Performance Management software is related to 360 Degree Feedback software, Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Enablement software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Enablement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Enablement covers content and communication tools that help sales teams show off product information to prospective customers, engage potential leads, and overall boost sales team performance. These solutions align sales with marketing to ensure that the sales team gets the most up to date materials. Sales Enablement software includes presentation tools and gamification applications, as well as collaborative content editing and sharing solutions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Training software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Training tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Training software, also known as eLearning or Computer-Based Training (CBT) software, automates educational activities for students and/or corporate employees. Training solutions are often customizable based on the needs of specific organizations and include capabilities such as course registration and testing, certification tracking, conferencing, skills tracking, and reporting. Training applications may provide the framework for presenting classes, as well as an ecommerce functions, to allow for payments. Training software is related to Courseware and Learning Management Systems (LMS).

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Virtual Reality (VR) software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of VR tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: VR, or Virtual Reality, software is used to create immersive 3D environments that could be used for training or product prototyping. Additionally, immercive and interctive VR environments are often used in entertainment industry.

_source.short_desc: Spinify's results speak for themselves, our users see on average a 43% increase in sales, and a KPI Increase of 287%.
_source.long_desc:
Maximize your team's performance and build a collaborative culture with the #1 Sales Gamification Platform. 

Replace the old whiteboard and broadcast engaging and lively leaderboards straight to your office TV. Celebrate your team with personalized achievements, and customizable incentives. Set up your team for success with Spinify's motivating coaching tools!
_source.target_audience: Spinify is for organizations that want to level up their team's performance and create a motivating culture through gamified competitions, recognition, and coaching.

media.caption: Provide visibility of data for your reps to get a better understanding of how they are performing.
Setup competitions with individual reps, teams, head to head, races, elimination games and more!
Staff are motivated to change work behaviors as they see how their performance compares to the team.
Add fun and excitement to your team by ranking their performance and celebrating their achievements!
Our customers experience a boosts in productivity and performance. Start hitting your targets!

category_features.name: Data Connectors
category_features.definition: Integrate or connect different data sources/applications/platforms for analysis and dashboard preparation

category_features.name: Data Visualization
category_features.definition: Graphical representation of the data

category_features.name: Functions/Calculations
category_features.definition: Perform various mathematical calculations using the data

category_features.name: KPI Monitoring
category_features.definition: Tracking the status of previously identified performance measurements

category_features.name: Private Dashboards
category_features.definition: Share dashboard screen within private user groups

category_features.name: Public Dashboards
category_features.definition: Publish dashboard publicly on various platforms

category_features.name: Scorecards
category_features.definition: Capture statistical records to measure achievements or progress towards  a particular goal.

category_features.name: Widgets
category_features.definition: An extended application or connectors that enables users to perform additional services with their current set of tools

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why Asana is a top performer on Capterra.
related_products.features: Asana helps teams orchestrate their work-from daily tasks to strategic cross-functional initiatives. With Asana, teams are more confident, move faster, and accomplish more with less-no matter where they are located. More than 119,000 paying customers and millions of free organizations across 190 countries rely on Asana to manage everything from company objectives to digital transformation to product launches and marketing campaigns.

related_products.short_desc: Create your own custom dashboard with drag-and-drop building blocks that let you see all of your team's work at a glance.
related_products.features: On monday.com's open platform, you can create dashboards within minutes on pre-made templates. Or, add columns, widgets, and apps to fully customize your dashboard for your workflows, no matter how unique they may be. With full visibility, you'll be able to reduce long email threads and meetings while your team gets even more done. The all-in-one platform your team will actually enjoy using, monday.com's dashboards allow you to have both the "best in class" and the "enterprise suite."

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Tableau Software helps people see and understand data. Tableau delivers fast analytics, visualization and business intelligence.
related_products.features: Tableau helps people transform data into actionable insights that make an impact. Easily connect to data stored anywhere, in any format. Quickly perform ad hoc analyses that reveal hidden opportunities. Drag and drop to create interactive dashboards with advanced visual analytics. Then share your work with anyone and make an impact on your business. From global enterprises to early-stage startups and small businesses, people everywhere use Tableau to see and understand their data. Learn More!

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications. New customers get $300 in free credits to fully explore and conduct an assessment of Google Cloud. You won't be charged until you upgrade. Google Cloud Platform offers a modular-based platform providing build and scale services to businesses of any size within any industry. In addition to cloud storage and scalable data warehouses with built-in machine learning, Google Cloud Platform provides relational and non-relational databases for transactions, complex queries, streaming, offline sync, and more. A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

related_products.short_desc: Sisense delivers rapid, full-scale analytics on large and scattered datasets and allows for easy exploration of complex data.
related_products.features:
Sisense is the only business intelligence software that makes it easy for users to prepare, analyze and visualize complex data. Sisense provides an end-to-end solution for tackling growing data sets from multiple sources, that comes out-of-the-box with the ability to crunch terabytes of data and support thousands of users--all on a single commodity server.

Sisense has already won over the hearts of some of the worlds leading, most data-intensive companies, including eBay, Henry Schein, NASA

related_products.short_desc: ProWorkflow is an industry leading and much loved project, task and workflow management software.
related_products.features: ProWorkflow is an industry-leading comprehensive project management tool for teams of 5 to 5000. 17 years of experience and trusted for over 3 million projects, we understand small details through to big data. Track Gantt chart tasks, Kanban boards, time, documents, communications, quotes and invoices. Our powerful API and customizable features let you easily tailor ProWorkflow. World-class customer support & free on-boarding makes the decision to join easy.

related_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.
related_products.features:
Grow is a no-code, full-stack business intelligence (BI) platform that empowers everyone in your organization to make data-driven decisions. 

By combining ETL, data warehousing and visualization in one easy-to-use platform, any organization can connect and explore its data to surface insights. 

Our unlimited-user license model provides a single source of truth for your company, giving everyone access to the answers they need.

related_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence service that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data.
related_products.features: An online business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports and dashboards in minutes, with no IT help. Data can be imported from files, web feeds, popular business applications, cloud and on-premises databases, cloud storages etc. Free for 2 users. Pricing starts at $25 per month.

related_products.short_desc: With Domo, you can empower your entire team with data insights in real-time, cloud-based dashboards.
related_products.features: Domo is no ordinary dashboard software. Built on the Domo platform, Domo's dashboards provide data in real-time, so your data is never stale. Create and share custom views of your data on the fly, in minutes, with dashboards that are orders of magnitude easier to use.

Or, add columns, widgets, and apps to fully customize your dashboard for your workflows, no matter how unique they may be. With full visibility, you'll be able to reduce long email threads and meetings while your team gets even more done. The all-in-one platform your team will actually enjoy using, monday.com's dashboards allow you to have both the "best in class" and the "enterprise suite."

similar_products.short_desc: Salesforce Datorama provides the leading cloud-based, AI-powered marketing intelligence and analytics platform.
similar_products.features: Salesforce Datorama provides the leading cloud-based, AI-powered marketing intelligence and analytics platform for enterprises, agencies, and publishers. Datorama provides marketing intelligence solutions for all marketers and helps you bring together all of your marketing data into one dashboard view. Create compelling data-driven stories with Datorama dashboards, optimize your marketing campaigns, and make data-driven decisions faster.

similar_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence service that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data.
similar_products.features: An online business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports and dashboards in minutes, with no IT help. Data can be imported from files, web feeds, popular business applications, cloud and on-premises databases, cloud storages etc. Free for 2 users. Pricing starts at $25 per month.

similar_products.short_desc: With Domo, you can empower your entire team with data insights in real-time, cloud-based dashboards.
similar_products.features: Domo is no ordinary dashboard software. Built on the Domo platform, Domo's dashboards provide data in real-time, so your data is never stale. Create and share custom views of your data on the fly, in minutes, with dashboards that are orders of magnitude easier to use.

similar_products.short_desc: Yellowfin is the only analytics suite that successfully combines action based dashboards with industry-leading automated analysis.
similar_products.features: Dashboards that not only drive action, but allow you take action without ever leaving Yellowfin. Yellowfin dashboarding allows you to custom code actions right on the dashboard that call on APIs, design anything with a pixel perfect canvas, and query the data with AI with just a click. Bring your users? workflows to the dashboard for seamless data decision making.

similar_products.short_desc: Analytics platform to connect to all your data sources and build and distribute highly customizable dashboards and reports.
similar_products.features:
Klipfolio is a powerful analytics and BI platform used by thousands of businesses to make better decisions. 

Connect to any data source and centralize all of your data in one place. Visualize, explore and distribute the data the way you need it. 

From highly customizable dashboards and reports to self-serve data exploration and client management, Klipfolio serves a broad range of analytics needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
similar_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

similar_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.
similar_products.features:
Grow is a no-code, full-stack business intelligence (BI) platform that empowers everyone in your organization to make data-driven decisions. 

By combining ETL, data warehousing and visualization in one easy-to-use platform, any organization can connect and explore its data to surface insights. 

Our unlimited-user license model provides a single source of truth for your company, giving everyone access to the answers they need.

similar_products.short_desc: AnswerRocket uses natural language processing and AI-driven automation to generate in-depth insights and visualizations in seconds.
similar_products.features: AnswerRocket is the AI-powered solution for business analytics. AnswerRocket leverages artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques to automate the hard work of business analysis, empowering teams to generate business intelligence and advanced analytics in seconds via powerful dashboard insights. Whether you need to ask questions in plain English, create interactive visualizations and dashboards, uncover actionable insights, or automate entire workflows, AnswerRocket has you covered.

similar_products.short_desc: Create better Dashboards with automated data collection from 500+ marketing and advertising platforms. Start your free trial today.
similar_products.features: Power your dashboards with cleaned, mapped data from over 500 marketing and advertising platforms. Funnel collects data from all your channels and sends it anywhere you want, a Dashboard Solution, Data Warehouse, BI Tool. Google Sheets, Data Studio, Tableau, Looker, you name it. Stop wasting time unifying data from multiple platforms and let Funnel do the hard work so you can focus on getting the most out of your numbers and figures. Free trial available.

similar_products.short_desc: Informer 5 is a robust, extensible, end-to-end data discovery and analytics platform connecting all your on-prem and cloud data.
similar_products.features: Informer 5 is a robust, embeddable data discovery and analytics platform that simplifies the process of accessing, cleansing, blending, and analyzing data. Explore, visualize and analyze relevant data on the fly. Securely publish Reports and collaborate with colleagues. Generate Dashboards that consolidate critical performance metrics.

similar_products.short_desc: FullStory helps businesses understand, measure, and perfect their digital experience across sites and apps.
similar_products.features: FullStory is a trusted Digital Experience Intelligence (DXI) platform that combines rich product analytics, robust session detail, and collaboration tools to deliver real-time insights that uncover opportunities on web and mobile experiences. FullStory's best-in-class DXI platform helps brands understand their users' digital experiences to eliminate friction and capitalize on what's successful.

similar_products.short_desc: Iridium provides law firms with Business Intelligence and financial analytics solutions to improve processes and profitability.
similar_products.features: Iridium Technology is a global firm specifically focused on business intelligence, profitability, and financial management for legal and professional services firms. Iridium has more than 300 law firm clients globally, ranging from 40 to 2000+ timekeepers. Iridiums mission is to help firms improve processes and maximize profitability. Iridium lives and breathes business intelligence and financial analytics for law firms every hour of every day. To learn more about Iridium Technology, please v

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Performance Management software provides organizations with the data they need to make decisions that are in line with company strategy. Business Performance Management solutions link performance measurements (key performance indicators, or KPIs) with strategic planning goals. The forecasting ability of these applications helps organizations analyze their actions and take corrective measures to meet performance goals. Business Performance Management software is related to Budgeting software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workflow Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workflow Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workflow Management software coordinates the flow of work and ensures changes are properly implemented. Workflow Management systems offer a collaborative environment that allows businesses to easily monitor and evaluate their processes. Organizations use Workflow Management systems to coordinate their business environment, facilitate instant access to accurate and up-to-date data on projects and performance, schedule and synchronize changes and test the effectiveness of business strategies. Workflow Management software is related to Business Process Management software, Requirements Management software, and Project Management software.
